p.e:
I, SLEEVES   , AM CREATING A GAME INSPIRED BY ANYLAND. IT IS FAR TOO EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT TO PRESENT, HOWEVER,
I KNOW THAT MANY PLAYERS (INCLUDING MYSELF) ARE BURSTING WITH IDEAS FOR ANYLAND AND ITS FUTURE. I AM FOR VARIOUS
REASONS UNCONFIDENT THAT ANYLAND WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY CONTINUED, THUS I WOULD LIKE TO COLLECT AND ORGANIZE THOSE
IDEAS HERE SO THAT I MAY USE THEM IN MY OWN PROJECT. IF AND WHEN IT GETS RELEASED, I BELIEVE THERE IS A FAIR CHUNK
OF PLAYERS WHO WOULD BE HAPPY TO JOIN A SPIRITUAL SUCCESSOR TO THIS GAME. IT'S ALSO JUST FUN TO DISCUSS FEATURES :)
